projects.Description: An intelligent learning platform built with Python and Django that optimizes student retention  using the SM-2 spaced repetition algorithm. It features a rule-based NLP chatbot tutor designed to provide context-aware explanations and manage study schedules based on memory performance.
projects.Reflection: This project helped my understanding of how to translate academic theories into functional code. It was my first major dive into NLP, teaching me how to handle intent classification and entity extraction without relying solely on external APIs, which is crucial for building efficient, localized AI tools.
projects.Skills Demonstrated:
Programming: Python, Django, SQL. 
AI/ML: SM-2 Algorithm Implementation, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Intent Classification. 
Software Engineering: Full-stack Development, Logic-based System Design.

projects.Description: A full-stack healthcare administration platform developed using PHP and MySQL to streamline patient records, doctor scheduling, and billing. It integrates the OpenFDA API to provide automated drug recommendations, ensuring data-driven support for medical staff.
projects.Reflection: Developing this system taught me the importance of data integrity and secure user authentication in sensitive environments. Integrating a third-party API (OpenFDA) was a key learning point as I learned a lot about using APIs.
projects.Skills Demonstrated: Web Development: PHP, MySQL, Bootstrap 5, jQuery. Integration: REST API (OpenFDA), JSON handling. Database: Relational Database Design, SQL queries. UI/UX: Responsive Design, Select2 implementation.

projects.Description: A smart waste management platform that uses Google Gemini 2.5 Flash to classify waste and provide creative upcycling (DIY) suggestions via real-time image analysis. It features a social community feed and a discovery hub built with React 19 and Tailwind CSS to gamify and educate users on sustainable disposal.
projects.Reflection: This project was my first experience implementing multimodal AI, which taught me how to handle image-to-text processing for practical utility. I learned how to balance high-tech AI features with social elements to create a user-centric experience, emphasizing the importance of "mobile-first" responsive design for tools intended for on-the-go usage.
projects.Skills Demonstrated:
AI/ML: Multimodal AI Integration (Google Gemini 2.5 Flash), Prompt Engineering for classification. 
Web Development: React 19, Tailwind CSS, Google GenAI SDK. 
Product Design: Gamification, Social Feature Logic, Knowledge Base Architecture.

projects.Description: An undergraduate thesis project developed for the Bureau of Fire Protection (BFP) featuring a Next.js frontend and FastAPI backend. It provides an interactive simulation environment to model fire spread and agent-based evacuation behaviors, helping officials analyze and improve building safety protocols.
projects.Reflection: As my undergraduate thesis, this project was a masterclass in professional collaboration and client organization. Beyond the technical challenges, I managed a formal partnership with the BFP, which required translating complex institutional safety needs into functional software requirements. I learned how to maintain a consistent feedback loop with stakeholders and work effectively within a development team to ensure our simulation met real-world emergency standards.
projects.Skills Demonstrated:
Technical: Next.js, FastAPI, Python, Agent-based Modeling. 
Professional: Client Relationship Management (BFP Partnership), Project Organization, Technical Documentation, Collaborative Software Development (Git/Agile).

projects.Description: A secure, full-stack dental clinic management platform built with Vanilla PHP and MySQL. It features interactive teeth selection for procedures, real-time appointment collision detection, and automated SMS notifications integrated via the Twilio API to reduce no-shows.
projects.Reflection: This project allowed me to implement advanced security protocols, such as password hashing and prepared statements, to protect sensitive patient data. I learned how to manage complex logical constraints, specifically in building a collision detection system for scheduling, and how to improve customer retention through automated third-party communication tools.
projects.Skills Demonstrated:
Backend: Vanilla PHP, MySQL (Relational Design). Security: SQL Injection Prevention, XSS Protection, Password Hashing. 
API Integration: Twilio SDK for SMS. 
Frontend: Bootstrap 5, Interactive JavaScript (Teeth Selection Logic).
